name: PATENT
desc: HAND LAUNCHABLE COPTER SYSTEM FOR SURVEILLANCE

name: Hand Launchable Copter for Surveillance
desc: A compact UAV for scouting and getting complete 360-degree surveillance within up to a 1.5 km radius.

name: Facial Recognition Attendance System (Edge Device)
desc: A cost-effective DL-FR based attendance system which runs on a lightweight edge computing device called an Image Analytic Device (IAD).

name: Autonomous Cervical Cancer Detection - Digital
desc: Utilizes advanced AI algorithms to analyze scanned Cervical Pap smear slide images and classify cellular anomalies.

name: JobsPyMatcher
desc: Classification based ML model with Text wrangling and similarity score on their resumes and target job description.

name: Toxic Audio Detection
desc: application to detect sections of inappropriate usage of words within audio files.Detect/track individuals exhibiting abusive verbal behavior.

name: Static Test Pad for High-Powered Rockets Developed
desc: a static test pad for high-powered rockets to evaluate engine performance and safety. Test pad ensuring safety and accuracy in data collection.

name: High-Altitude Balloon-Launched CubeSat
desc: a 1U CubeSat using a helium weather balloon, achieving a height of 122,000 feet and capturing experimental data and Earth curvature images.

name: International Journal of Advances in Medicine
desc: Clinical validation of artificial intelligence-based cataract screening solution with smartphone images.

name: Impostor Syndrome Comparison Map
desc: This project is part of The Inter-University Big Data Challenge (IUBDC'24) -comprehensive evaluation and visualization metric tool to measure Impostor Syndrome.

name: Book Recommendation System
desc: This system provides users with recommendations for books and incorporates data loading, a recommendation engineq.
